pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computation of the WHO 2007 References for School-Age Children and Adolescents (5 to 19 Years) // Provides WHO 2007 References for School-age Children and Adolescents (5 to 19 years) (z-scores) with confidence intervals and standard errors around the prevalence estimates, taking into account complex sample designs. More information on the methods is available online: https://www.who.int/tools/growth-reference-data- for-5to19-years.
